text: Jörg Hubert Meuthen (; born 29 June 1961) is a German economist and right wing extremist politician. He is the Federal spokesman for Alternative for Germany (AfD) since July 2015. Meuthen is professor for political economy and finance at the Academy of Kehl. == References == Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:German academics Category:Politicians from Baden-Württemberg Category:Politicians of the Alternative for Germany
title: Jörg Meuthen
